attributes.action: ban the purchase of british owned companies or stakes in those companies by foreign governments.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Yet another day goes by without hearing about some British company being taken over or bought into by a company owned or controlled by a foreign nation.  This amounts to selling off the country lock stock to another country which should never happen.

For example P&O was bought by a government in the middle east, London electricity is owned by EDF which is controlled by the French state.

What I would love this country to do is to say that no British company is eligible to be owned or bought into by any foreign company/fund which is controlled or owned by a foreign nation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
